blogPost.excerpt:
Tune in to a Nintendo Direct presentation featuring roughly 50 minutes of information focused on available games like Super Smash Bros Ultimate and games coming to Nintendo Switch in the first half of 2021.

#NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica

Follow us on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/Nintendo

blogPost.author: Nintendo

localize.title: 任天堂直接 - 2.17.2021
localize.description:
收看任天堂直接介绍，大约50分钟的信息集中在现有的游戏上，如超级大乱斗兄弟终极版和2021年上半年即将登陆任天堂Switch的游戏。

#NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

订阅更多任天堂的乐趣！https://goo.gl/HYYsot



请访问任天堂网了解所有最新情况！http://www.nintendo.com/。

previous.excerpt:
Splatoon 3 arrives on Nintendo Switch in 2022! In the wake of chaos, enter the sun scorched Splatlands and the new city, Splatsville, inhabited by battle-hardened Inklings and Octolings. New weapons, moves, and more await, so be sure to keep an eye out for updates in the future.  

#Splatoon3, #NintendoSwitch, #NintendoDirect

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/Nintendo
previous.title: Splatoon 3 – Announcement Trailer – Nintendo Switch

localize.title: Splatoon 3 - 公布预告片 - 任天堂Switch版
localize.description:
Splatoon 3》2022年登陆任天堂Switch! 在混乱之后，进入被太阳炙烤的Splatlands和新的城市Splatsville，这里居住着战斗力强悍的Inklings和Octolings。新的武器、招式等都在等待着你，请务必关注未来的更新。 

#Splatoon3, #NintendoSwitch, #NintendoDirect(任天堂直译)

订阅更多任天堂的乐趣！https://goo.gl/HYYsot



请访问任天堂网了解所有最新情况！http://www.nintendo.com/。



在Facebook上喜欢任天堂：http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo

在Twitter上关注我们：http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica

在Instagram上关注我们：http://instagram.com/Nintendo

在Pinterest上关注我们：http://pinterest.com/Nintendo

localize.title: Splatoon 3 - 公佈預告片 - 任天堂Switch版
localize.description:
Splatoon 3》2022年登陸任天堂Switch! 在混亂之後，進入被太陽炙烤的Splatlands和新的城市Splatsville，這裏居住着戰鬥力強悍的Inklings和Octolings。新的武器、招式等都在等待着你，請務必關注未來的更新。 

#Splatoon3, #NintendoSwitch, #NintendoDirect(任天堂直譯)

訂閱更多任天堂的樂趣！https://goo.gl/HYYsot
